description:
Subscore for Composite Asthma Severity Index (CASI) exacerbation assessment. Score 2 points for each systemic corticosteroid burst recorded in the first item from the exacerbation assessment, and 2 additional points for each associated hospitalization. Range of values (0, 2,4,6). [Wildfire JJ, Gergen PJ, Sorkness CA, et al. 2012 (PubMed ID: 22244599)](https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22244599/)

[Search for all CASI variables within this dataset](https://sleepdata.org/datasets/pats/variables?search=casi)
